item.title: 4 years at Piktochart
item.description: On Tuesday, the 27th of July 2021, I served my final day at Piktochart. I spent 4 years and some change at the company, joining as a JavaScript intern and leaving a DevOp & backend engineer for Piktostory. Piktochart was my first “real” job and having spent a good part of …
item.dc:creator: Dafne Kiyui

item.title: installing google-cloud-sdk on apple silicon m1 (early 2021)
item.description:
If you were to attempt to install google-cloud-sdk natively (via Homebrew) on Apple Silicon, you'd get the following error:

$ brew install --cask google-cloud-sdk
# etc...
==> Installing Cask google-cloud-sdk
Beginning update. This process may take several minutes.
ERROR: (gcloud.components.update) The following components are unknown [kuberun, anthoscli].
==> Purging files for version …
item.dc:creator: Dafne Kiyui

item.title: how to fix the zsh setup on macos
item.description:
Apple has defaulted macOS to using the zsh shell since macOS Catalina. For many, the switch (if they weren't already using zsh) was as simple as running chsh -s /bin/zsh and everything would appear to be working just fine.

On brand new Macs however, both the .zprofile and .zshrc …
item.dc:creator: Dafne Kiyui

item.title: how to use a valid email when signing up for Sephora
item.description:
Please don't take anything in this article seriously.

Gmail, Outlook, and Yahoo! Mail are popular options for creating incredible email addresses that will be compliant with most software and are allowed to bypass sophisticated spam filters as the following:

<?php

if (endsWith($sender, "gmail.com") ||
    endsWith($sender, 'yahoo.com') ||
    endsWith …

item.title: Free and open source software and GitHub
item.description: The news that youtube-dl had been struck by DMCA takedown notice by RIAA has been circulating in many tech circles such as Hacker News, inviting regular criticism of GitHub and the volatility of software hosting platforms. Akin to when Microsoft acquired GitHub or when GitHub banned users in Iran (among …
item.dc:creator: Dafne Kiyui

item.title: how to migrate your GitHub repository to Codeberg
item.description:
The easiest way to migrate repositories is to simply change where your local repository remote points to. In a locally cloned repository, assert that you should have a git remote (usually named origin) by running git remote -v:

origin  git@github.com:username/repository.git (fetch)
origin  git@github.com …

item.title: rewriting "night light slider"
item.description: I'm the author of the Night Light Slider extension for GNOME Shell. When I originally authored the extension in late 2017, my intention was to simply add a slider, kin to the brightness slider, to manage the temperature of the GNOME Shell "Night Light" feature. A couple of feature requests …

item.title: setTimeout and setInterval in gjs
item.description: The GLib.timeout_add function is the GJS equivalent to both setTimeout and setInterval. It calls a given function repeatedly (such as func) at given intervals until it returns a falsy value. It returns a GLib Source id, which just like clearTimeout or clearInterval can be removed with the static GLib …
item.dc:creator: Dafne Kiyui
